introduction: Mark and Erik are an “unmarried” gay couple who have been together for ten years. They long to have biological children. Searching for a surrogate mother on the Internet, they meet Wen, a wife, mother and practicing witch. Over the next three years this unique partnership encounters obstacles that challenge their desire for a child and threaten the growing bonds between them. A ruthlessly honest portrait of an American family … with a 21st Century twist. “Other Same-Sex-Parent Stories May Pale in Comparison To This Unique And Beautiful tale.” – Time Out NY
